title: Trust Artifact Corruption
fault_description: Inject a bitflip in a trust artifact checksum field to simulate corruption. Verifies that integrity checks detect the corruption and the repair procedure restores correct state.
fault_injection_steps: Select a trust artifact in the isolated test environment
Flip a single bit in the checksum field
Write the corrupted artifact back to storage
recovery_steps: Detect trust artifact integrity failure via periodic check
Activate safe mode to freeze trust operations
Identify which artifacts are corrupted via full scan
Restore corrupted artifacts from last verified snapshot
Re-derive trust chain from verified root of trust
Re-validate all trust delegations against policy
verification_steps: Confirm all trust artifact checksums are valid
Verify safe mode has been exited
Confirm no unauthorized trust mutations occurred
abort_conditions: Corruption spreads to artifacts outside drill scope
Trust chain cannot be re-derived from root
Recovery time exceeds 3x SLO with no progress
